content: How can you help me with language detection and translation?

To detect the language of a text, you can simply type the text and add the command "/lang" at the end. For example, "Hello, how are you doing today? /lang". I will respond with the detected language.

To translate a text from one language to another, you can type the text you want to translate followed by the command "/translate" and then the target language code. For example, "Bonjour, comment Ã§a va? /translate en" will translate the text to English. You can find a list of language codes here: https://cloud.google.com/translate/docs/languages.
